audit_summary: Core Health and Performance has a clean, well-presented website with a perfect Google rating and solid desktop performance. The primary opportunity is the absence of a content or blog section, which limits ongoing search visibility for a health and fitness business. Adding a content section alongside an online booking pathway would directly address the two most actionable gaps.

performance: Mobile PageSpeed score of 63 indicates moderate performance — possible contributing factors include platform script overhead or unoptimised images, though this cannot be confirmed from public signals alone
Desktop PageSpeed score of 93 is strong — the core build performs well on desktop
mobile_ux: Mobile UX is rated ok — the site is functional on mobile but may have friction points affecting new client conversion
For a health and fitness business, ensuring consultation CTAs and contact options are prominent and easily tappable on mobile would support the enquiry pathway
conversion: Contact form is present — a basic enquiry pathway is in place
No booking or consultation system is present — for a health and fitness business this limits the ability of new clients to take a direct next step
No click-to-call functionality was identified in the input signals
seo_fundamentals: No blog or updates section is present — this is the primary SEO gap for a health and professional business where content authority and freshness directly support search visibility
Notes confirm a single-page static layout with no dynamic content section — limited content depth reduces the number of indexable pages and keyword targets
Location data available (Westport, Co. Mayo) — LocalBusiness schema markup relevant to health and fitness would strengthen local search appearance if not already implemented
trust_social_proof: Perfect 5.0 Google rating across 53 reviews is an exceptional trust signal for a health business
Testimonials are manually displayed per notes — dynamically embedding live Google Reviews would surface this strong social proof more effectively and reduce ongoing manual effort
security_maintenance: SSL is active — secure browsing is in place
Site runs on Wix — platform-level infrastructure is managed by Wix, though content freshness, image optimisation, and page structure remain within the owner's control

p1_quick_wins: Add a blog or content section covering fitness tips, client stories, or service updates — this is the most direct action to improve organic search visibility for a health business
Replace manually displayed testimonials with a dynamically embedded Google Reviews widget to surface the perfect 5.0 rating automatically
p2_growth_improvements: Add an online consultation or booking request system — reduces friction for new clients and supports conversion from search traffic
Review mobile performance settings within Wix, particularly image sizing and lazy loading, to move the mobile score from moderate to strong
Implement LocalBusiness and relevant health business schema markup to strengthen local search appearance
p3_strategic_enhancements: Consider expanding from a single-page to a multi-page structure as content grows — supports deeper SEO coverage and improves navigation for returning visitors

assumptions_and_unknowns: Hosting infrastructure is managed by Wix — hosting provider details beyond platform are not applicable
Click-to-call presence was not confirmed in input signals
Social media links and profiles were not included in the input
Schema markup presence cannot be confirmed from public signals alone
next_best_action: Share a short SEO improvement plan focused on adding a content section, and propose a 15 minute call to discuss how regular updates and a booking system could grow new client enquiries
